item.title: Forgetting, Ignorance or Myopia: Revisiting Key Challenges in Online Continual Learning
item.description: NsCE framework tackles key OCL challenges: model ignorance (learning effective features in limited time) and myopia (overly simplified features). NsCE integrates non-sparse maximum separation regulari…
